name: scary-poems
scary-1:
The dark raven,
it's an ill omen.
When your life is at it's end
you will see.
The raven has come for me.
scary-2:
I sat in my room. 
Pondering
They were watching,
waiting. 
For the end.
scary-3:
On my way home 
I walk past a cemetery.
Nothing ever happens,
it is a quiet place 
usually.
An old lady stands in front of an old grave.
We talk for a while.
She says I am delightful! 
We would have been friends
were she alive.
scary-4:
They whisper to me
about things past and yet to come.
All I must is listen closely
to the abyss.
I gaze upon them
they gaze upon me.
